meanings.definition: A type of reed pen used for writing in Arabic calligraphy.
meanings.sent1: I bought a set of kalams to practice my Arabic calligraphy.
meanings.sent2: The artist carefully selected a kalam to create intricate designs.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat knocked over the kalam, leaving ink stains everywhere.
meanings.sent4: Her words flowed from the kalam like a river of wisdom.
meanings.sent5: The kalam danced gracefully on the paper, leaving elegant strokes behind.

meanings.definition: A collection of sayings or teachings attributed to a particular Islamic scholar or saint.
meanings.sent1: The library contained a treasure trove of ancient kalams from renowned scholars.
meanings.sent2: She found solace in reading the kalams of the wise Sufi mystic.
meanings.sent3: The children giggled as they tried to mimic the serious tone of the kalam.
meanings.sent4: His words were like kalams etched in the hearts of his followers.
meanings.sent5: The kalams whispered secrets of the past, guiding those who listened.
